page.title: 05TARRANT RAWSTON DAIRY FARM
page.content: RAWSTON FARM,LUTON FARM AND DOWN BARN FARM ARE ALL OWNED BY THE COSSINS FAMILY.THEY ARE DAIRY FARMS.THEIR HERD IS "THE RAWSTAR HERD OF BRITISH FRIESIANS".THEY HAVE ABOUT 330 COWS & ONE BULL.ALL COWS HAVE A NUMBER AND A NAME.THE FARMS COVER A TOTAL OF ABOUT 1,400 ACRES WHICH INCLUDE APPROX.700 ACRES OF CEREALS,570 ACRES OF GRASS & FORAGE,PLUS 130 ACRES FOR AMENITY USE, INCLUDING ASHLEY WOOD GOLF COURSE.THE COSSINS FAMILY HAVE BEEN FARMERS AT RAWSTON FOR FIVE GENERATIONS. THE COWS ARE MILKED AT FIVE O,CLOCK IN THE MORNING AND TWO O,CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON. THEY HAVE A COMPUTER AT THE BACK OF THE MILKING PARLOUR TO OPERATE THE COWS FOOD BOXES.THEY GIVE ABOUT 5,000 LITRES OF MILK A DAY.THE MILK IS COLLECTED BY A MILK TANKER AND TAKEN TO A LOCAL CREAMERY.
